attributes.action: RIGHT TO LIVE AND WORK IN UK
attributes.additional_details:
A TEMPORARY HALT TO ALL ENTRY INTO THE UK TO ALL BUT UK CITIZENS.
A 3 MONTH  AMNESTY FOR ALL THAT ARE HERE ILLEGALLY TO COME FORWARD ENABLING THEM TO HAVE THEIR CASE REVIEWED.AFTER 3 MONTH PERIOD ANYONE FOUND WITHOUT THE RIGHT TO STAY IS DEPORTED WITHOUT ANY APPEAL AS OPERTUNITY IN 3 MONTHS HAS BEEN GIVEN.
AFTER A REASONABLE TIME A TRUE FIGURE OF HOW MANY PEOPLE WE HAVE WILL BE KNOWN AND DO WE NEED A BETTER WAY OF ALLOWING MORE IN.
